Package reactor.bus.routing

Event routing means sending a given Event to the correct Consumers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Router
    An Router is used to route an Object to Consumers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsumerFilteringRouter
    An Router that filters consumers before routing events to them.
    TraceableDelegatingRouter  

Package reactor.bus.routing Description

Event routing means sending a given Event to the correct Consumers.
